mapper.select: SELECT r.role_id as roleId, r.role_name as roleName, r.role_display as roleDisplay FROM sys_ua ua,sys_role r WHERE ua.role_id=r.role_id AND ua.user_id=#{userID}

SELECT r.role_id as roleId, r.role_name as roleName, r.role_display as roleDisplay FROM sys_ua ua,sys_role r,sys_user u WHERE u.user_id=ua.user_id AND ua.role_id=r.role_id AND u.login_name=#{username}
